member.exception: If there is not sufficient bytes available.

member.exception: If there is not sufficient bytes available.

member.summary: Manages an MQTT connection. Implements MQTT v3.1.1, as defined in http://docs.oasis-open.org/mqtt/mqtt/v3.1.1/os/mqtt-v3.1.1-os.html

member.param: Host name or IP address of MQTT server.

member.param: Host name or IP address of MQTT server.
If TLS is used to encrypt communication.

member.param: Host name or IP address of MQTT server.
Topic to publish the last will and testament, in case the connection drops unexpectedly.
Quality of Service of last will and testament, in case the connection drops unexpectedly.
If last will and testament should be retained, in case the connection drops unexpectedly.
Data of last will and testament, in case the connection drops unexpectedly.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient.Reconnect
member.summary: Reconnects a client after an error or if it's offline. Reconnecting, instead of creating a completely new connection, saves time.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient.PING
member.summary: Sends a PING message to the server. This is automatically done to keep the connection alive. Only call this method if you want to send additional PING messages, apart from the ones sent to keep the connection alive.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient.OnConnectionError
member.summary: Event raised when a connection to a broker could not be made.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient.OnError
member.summary: Event raised when an error was encountered.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient.OnPing
member.summary: Event raised whenever a ping message is sent, i.e. when connection is idle.

member.name: E:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttClient.OnPingResponse
member.summary: Event raised whenever a ping response is received, i.e. when connection is kept active, while idle.

member.summary: Host or IP address of MQTT server.

member.summary: Event raised when unsubscription has been successfully received.

member.summary: Client to Server. Client request to connect to Server

member.summary: Server to Client Connect acknowledgment

member.summary: Client to Server or Server to Client Publish message

member.summary: Client to Server or Server to Client Publish acknowledgment

member.summary: Client to Server or Server to Client Publish received (assured delivery part 1)

member.summary: Client to Server or Server to Client Publish release (assured delivery part 2)

member.summary: Client to Server or Server to Client Publish complete (assured delivery part 3)

member.summary: Client to Server Client subscribe request

member.summary: Server to Client Subscribe acknowledgment

member.summary: Client to Server Unsubscribe request

member.summary: Server to Client Unsubscribe acknowledgment

member.summary: Client to Server PING request

member.summary: Client to Server Client is disconnecting

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader
member.summary: Contains information in the MQTT header.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.ControlPacketType
member.summary: Control packet type.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.QualityOfService
member.summary: Quality of Service level.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.Retain
member.summary: Retain flag.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.Duplicate
member.summary: Duplicate delivery flag.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.RemainingLength
member.summary: The Remaining Length is the number of bytes remaining within the current packet, including data in the variable header and the payload. The Remaining Length does not include the bytes used to encode the Remaining Length.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.PacketIdentifier
member.summary: The variable header component of many of the Control Packet types includes a 2 byte Packet Identifier field.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttHeader.Parse(Waher.Networking.MQTT.BinaryInput)
member.summary: Parses a header.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttQualityOfService
member.summary: MQTT Quality of Service level.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttQualityOfService.AtMostOnce
member.summary: The message is delivered according to the capabilities of the underlying network. No response is sent by the receiver and no retry is performed by the sender. The message arrives at the receiver either once or not at all.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttQualityOfService.AtLeastOnce
member.summary: This quality of service ensures that the message arrives at the receiver at least once. A QoS 1 PUBLISH Packet has a Packet Identifier in its variable header and is acknowledged by a PUBACK Packet. Section 2.3.1 provides more information about Packet Identifiers.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttQualityOfService.ExactlyOnce
member.summary: This is the highest quality of service, for use when neither loss nor duplication of messages are acceptable. There is an increased overhead associated with this quality of service. A QoS 2 message has a Packet Identifier in its variable header. Section 2.3.1 provides more information about Packet Identifiers. The receiver of a QoS 2 PUBLISH Packet acknowledges receipt with a two-step acknowledgement process.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.MQTT.MqttState
